caption.title: scanning electron microscopy (SEM) images of Candida tropicalis (ATCC 750) forming biofilms in the presence of 0.5 mg/mL Cinnamomum verum leaf oil (A and D), 1.0 mg/mL C. verum leaf oil (B and E), 2.0 mg/mL C. verum leaf oil (C and F), 0.125 mg/mL chlorhexidine digluconate (G and J) and 0.008 mg/mL Fluconazole (H and K) I and L: negative control. Red circle: cell wall deformities with treatments. Red solid arrow: leakages of intracellular components.
